duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform 2D/M-Mode, Doppler, Stress Echocardiograms, and Transesophogeal Echocardiograms, including processing all orders and reports.
Direct supervision of students at the discretion of the area supervisor.
Provide primary caregiver availability to the student throughout the shift.

education_certification.credential: Associate degree in sonography specializing in cardiology preferred.
